WhoWeare.title:
Who
We are?
WhoWeare.content:
Praedicta is one of the leading
 companies in Israel in the field of
 financial and economic information
 services, which provides its customers
 with smart information solutions adapted
 to the specific needs. Through a skilled
 team and advanced methods, we
 perform analyzes, analyze information
 and translate it into a final solution, as an
 innovative user interface or as a
 customer-tailored product.
WhoWeare.content_xs:
Praedicta is one of the leading companies

  provides its customers with smart

  specific needs. Through a skilled team

  customer-tailored product.

Our
vision

bonds.title: Bonds
bonds.content:
Praedicta's Bonds System enables its users to receive a wide variety of
 information and data on this market helping the user find, understand and
 analyze various aspects of this market. Bonds hold 10 years of historical data and
 offers daily data on trading results, yields, adjusted rates, volumes and cycles,
 market value and.
